name: newLISP
short_description: newLISP for BSDs, LINUX, MacOS X, SunOS and Win32: small, fast 350+ functions, a -C-, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, ODBC, TCP/IP, UDP, XML, Java interface, string processing, regular expressions , math, financial, statistical functions, Win32 DLL
